EmailTemplate.name: Webinar-Analyst-voke-2014-03-18 All Geos.Invite.Voke.Prospects Last Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Thought Leadership Webinar with voke – Drive Test Automation with 8 Key Factors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Software is everywhere and unavoidable. Every company is in some respect a software company, and customers expect software to perform flawlessly. When it doesn't, the brand suffers.
Join Theresa Lanowitz, Founder, voke, inc., and Wolfgang Platz, Founder and CPO, Tricentis, as they discuss how Global 2000 companies can:
- Protect their brand using Extreme Automation - Drive testing innovation with 8 key factors - Deliver on cost, quality, and schedule with the right innovation framework
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/Webinar-Analyst-voke-2014-03-18.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
If you have any questions about Tricentis webinars, feel free to contact us <mailto:Tricentis%20Webinar%20%3cwebinar@tricentis.com%3e>.
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/Webinar-Analyst-voke-2014-03-18.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> <http://innovate.tricentis.com/Webinar-Analyst-voke-2014-03-18.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>Date: Tuesday, March 18, 2014
Time: 1:00 p.m. - 2:00 p.m. EDT (10:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. PDT)
Theresa Lanowitz Founder, voke, inc.
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
